name: evenout
description: This project is built with a React frontend and an Express backend. Users can create threads, and other users can upvote or downvote these threads. The system ensures that if a user changes their vote (e.g., from upvote to downvote), the previous vote is removed.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd.. && cd server && npm install

author: Qin Haichen, Wong Zhi Jun
